HomepageView.makeApplicationExplanation: Have credits earned at other universities recognized for modules at the University of Leipzig. This is useful, for example, if you are transferring from another university to the University of Leipzig, returning after a semester abroad, or taking courses concurrently at another university.
HomepageView.viewStatusExplanation: Here you can view the status of your already submitted application. Enter the 6-digit process number provided to you when submitting the application. Alternatively, you can also find this process number in the overview of your application as a PDF.

sideInfo.goToStudy: Once the application is complete, take all relevant documents to the Student Office

HomepageView.ApplicationCode: Process Number of the Application to Be Accessed

AccountAdminCreate.UserExists: A user with this name already exists

FilterSelector.SearchAfter: Search for: Process Number, Module Name, University

ApplicationInfoBox.Explanation: Select the course for which you want to have credits recognized. Then enter the details of the credits. You can add as many module assignments as you like.
ApplicationInfoBox.ForeignModule: One or more foreign modules to be credited as module(s) at the University of Leipzig.
ApplicationInfoBox.belongingModules: Only specifically related modules should be written in a module assignment.
ApplicationInfoBox.multipleAssignments: For the entire application, you can add multiple module assignments.
ApplicationInfoBox.exactModule: A specific module taken at another university.
ApplicationInfoBox.FillFields: The given fields must be filled out for this.
ApplicationInfoBox.CreditSystem: Specify the credit system (LP, ECTS, or similar).
ApplicationInfoBox.uploadPDF: As module description, a PDF file with the official description of the individual module must be uploaded.
ApplicationInfoBox.ModulesLeipzig: Modules of the University of Leipzig
ApplicationInfoBox.ChoseModule: Choose one or more module(s) for which you want to have your credits recognized.
ApplicationInfoBox.ChoseNone: If you cannot find a suitable module, you also have the option not to select one.
ApplicationInfoBox.FurtherInformation: Additional information about this module assignment can be provided here, this is optional.

ManagementCreate.NameCourseEmpty: Name of the Course cannot be empty
ManagementCreate.ModuleNameExists: Module Name or Module Code already exists

StatusDetailView.FormalMistakeExplanation: Your application has been rejected due to formal errors. The module assignments containing formal errors are marked in red. In the module assignment, you will find an explanation of the specific error at the bottom. Please correct all indicated errors. Then you can resubmit your application.
StatusDetailView.FinalDecisionExplanation: A final decision has been made on your application. This is only information about the possibility of recognition. To officially have your credits recognized, you must go to the Student Office. Please bring all relevant documents that prove the completion of the credits to be recognized. If you have further questions about your application, please contact the Student Office.

SideInfoStudyOffice.fmi: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science
SideInfoStudyOffice.ActualOfficeHours: Tuesday and Thursday: 9:00 - 11:30 am and 12:30 - 4:00 pm

StatusPanel.NotYetDecided: No decision has been made yet

PanelExternalModulesItem.PointsNum: Points must be specified as a number

PanelInternalModules.ModulesUniLeipzig: Modules of the University of Leipzig
PanelInternalModules.NoModulesSelected: No modules of the University of Leipzig are selected.

PanelHeader.ModulesUniLeipzig: Modules of the University of Leipzig

ApplicationConfirmationView.NoteCode: Note the process number. This is necessary to later check the status of your application.

LoginView.InvalidData: Invalid login credentials. Please try again
